subject: Football (College)
Bowl Games
lead_paragraph: Saturday’s game between South Alabama and Bowling Green benefits the Sun Belt and Mid-American Conferences; ESPN, which owns and will broadcast it; and Montgomery, Ala., which will host it.
snippet: Saturday’s game between South Alabama and Bowling Green benefits the Sun Belt and Mid-American Conferences; ESPN, which owns and will broadcast it; and Montgomery, Ala., which will host it.
